page.description: Returns a pointer to a calculated field.

argument.name: variables
argument.description: A pointer to the variable scope. See Variable Data Types and Scope.

argument.name: name
argument.description: The name of the calculated value. Character

page.discussion: The CALCULATED_FIELD_GET() function returns a pointer to a calculated value. Desktop applications only.
page.example: dim ptr as P dim pp as P pp = local_variables() ptr = calculated_field_get(pp, "all_days_average")
